DifficultyDef.label: ☮ Peaceful
DifficultyDef.description: For those who want to relax and build a colony in a sandbox-like environment.\n\nMajor threatening events are disabled, but colonists can still get grumpy and animals can still go crazy from time to time.

DifficultyDef.label: ✬ Base Builder
DifficultyDef.description: For those who want to build a colony with a taste of danger.\n\nMajor threats appear, but they're weakened. Some of the extremely dangerous events are disabled.

DifficultyDef.label: ✠ Mediocre
DifficultyDef.description: For players on their first game, or casual players who still want a challenge.\n\nThreats are dangerous but not brutal.

DifficultyDef.label: ☫ Rough
DifficultyDef.description: It's a rough planet.\n\nThreats can be quite dangerous. Not recommended until you've got some experience with the game.

DifficultyDef.label: ✇ Intense
DifficultyDef.description: A significant challenge.\n\nSucceeding at this level requires a solid and well-rounded understanding of survival strategies, and some luck.

DifficultyDef.label: ☢ Extreme
DifficultyDef.description: As hard as a diamond-bladed dagger.\n\nEnemies are numerous, prices are poor, food is scarce, and colonists are grumpy. For those who enjoy digital suffering.

DifficultyDef.label: ☣ Madness
DifficultyDef.description:
Have you gone mad? You are going to regret not choosing an easier difficulty, young colonist.

Madness Mode Attributes
✶ 2x the Enemies
✶ 70% Market Value
✶ 70% Crop Yield
✶ Permanent -10 Colonist Mood Buff

Let us see how well you fair against some of the worse odds known to man?

DifficultyDef.label: ☠ Impossible
DifficultyDef.description:
Impossible I tell you, Please believe me!

Impossible Mode Attributes
✶ 4x the Enemies
✶ 40% Market Value
✶ 40% Crop Yield
✶ Permanent -13 Colonist Mood Buff.

Let us see how well you fair against some of the worse odds known to man?
